message: Your offer is tempting, but let's be a bit more realistic. How about a 55/45 split in your favor?
I can do 57-43, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
Time is running out, and we both lose if we can't agree. This is my final offer, let's split the difference and get this done.
I'm willing to take a bit more, considering the inflation is on my side.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  I'm taking a hit from inflation here.  Meet me in the middle or this deal is off!
Inflation is eating away at your share. I can afford to wait.
